item.description:
Our member Chuck will reserve 2 tables for our group as he has done in the past. The comedy night there was a blast!!! Tickets are $20 which Chuck is willing to front for our members. If you reply yes you can pay Chuck that evening. If a no-show because something unexpected came up you are still expected to reimburse the purchase if it cannot be sold to anyone else. Please keep that in mind when responding. If we exceed 2 tables there may be a possibility of purchasing a third... Please respond as soon as possible so we can estimate numbers and be sure to get tickets for everyone.
And, special "thanks" to Chuck for helping to organize this event for us!

?Changes In Latitudes? New England?s Premiere Jimmy Buffet Tribute Band
21+Show ? Cash Bar ? Bring Your Own Food
50/50 Raffle ? Prizes ? Doors Open At 6 pm

Proceeds benefit the Woburn Lions Club Charities.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Chuck when you come in...

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Parrothead Party Night
